name: Config Folder
info:
A block that reads in a config file and coverts
it to a JSON object.

To specify where the config files are, configPath
parameter within the global context needs to be set specifing the absolute path to the config folder.

Set the msg.payload to specify which config file to read.

Example : "config.json" ===>
        reads in the config.json file

name: Retireves the contents of the config file
